How often do you use your mobile banking: I use my mobile banking app at least once a day to check my account balance, transfer funds, and pay bills. It's convenient for me because I'm always on the go with my small business.

What features do you wish your current b: I wish my current banking app had a budgeting tool that could help me track my expenses and save money. It would also be helpful if it had an option to deposit checks through the app instead of having to go to the bank in person.

What are your financial goals in the sho: My short-term financial goals include expanding my business by investing in new equipment and hiring additional staff. I also want to save more money for emergencies and unexpected expenses.

What are your financial goals in the lon: My long-term financial goals include saving enough money for retirement and starting a family. I also hope to eventually expand my business to other locations and offer more services.
